text: Dawn at the Alamo is a 1905 painting by Henry Arthur McArdle, displayed in the Texas State Capitol's Senate Chamber, in Austin, Texas, United States. Note: User must click on "Dawn at the Alamo". The artwork has received some negative criticism by scholars for depicting David Crockett and William B. Travis with "an angelic glow amid dark imagery". ==See also== * 1905 in art ==References== Category:1905 paintings Category:History paintings Category:Paintings in Austin, Texas
title: Dawn at the Alamo
